name: checkbox
title: :checkbox Selector
desc: Selects all elements of type checkbox.

entries.longdesc: $(':checkbox') is equivalent to $('[type=checkbox]'). As with other pseudo-class selectors (those that begin with a ":") it is recommended to precede it with a tag name or some other selector; otherwise, the universal selector ("*") is implied. In other words, the bare $(':checkbox') is equivalent to $('*:checkbox'), so $('input:checkbox') should be used instead.
